name: HyperSuite
short_description: HyperSuite is a collection of two projects, HyperRecord & HyperView.  HyperRecord is an ActiveRecord-inspired Java framework for creating CRUD apps very quickly.  HyperView is a JSF/Seam-based framework for creating CRUD web apps very quickly.
